interface.name: auditadm_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the audit administrator role.

interface.name: auditadm_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the audit administrator role.

desc.p: Change from the audit administrator role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: guest_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the guest role.

interface.name: guest_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the guest role.

desc.p: Change from the guest role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: logadm_role_change_to

This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: secadm_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the security administrator role.

interface.name: secadm_role_change_to_template
interface.summary: Change from the security administrator role.

desc.p: Change from the security administrator role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: staff_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the staff role.

interface.name: staff_role_change_to

interface.name: sysadm_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the system administrator role.

interface.name: sysadm_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the system administrator role.

desc.p: Change from the system administrator role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: sysadm_shell_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a shell in the sysadm domain.

interface.name: sysadm_bin_spec_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a generic bin program in the sysadm domain.

interface.name: sysadm_entry_spec_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute all entrypoint files in the sysadm domain. This is an explicit transition, requiring the caller to use setexeccon().

interface.name: sysadm_entry_spec_domtrans_to
interface.summary: Allow sysadm to execute all entrypoint files in a specified domain. This is an explicit transition, requiring the caller to use setexeccon().

desc.p: Allow sysadm to execute all entrypoint files in a specified domain. This is an explicit transition, requiring the caller to use setexeccon().
This is a interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: sysadm_bin_spec_domtrans_to
interface.summary: Allow sysadm to execute a generic bin program in a specified domain. This is an explicit transition, requiring the caller to use setexeccon().

desc.p: Allow sysadm to execute a generic bin program in a specified domain.
This is a interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: sysadm_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to sysadm users.

interface.name: sysadm_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use sysadm file descriptors

interface.name: sysadm_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write sysadm user unnamed pipes.

desc.p: Allow sysadm to debug or ptrace all processes.

interface.name: unconfined_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the unconfineduser role.

desc.p: Change from the unconfineduser role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: unconfined_domtrans
interface.summary: Transition to the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_run
interface.summary: Execute specified programs in the unconfined domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_shell_domtrans
interface.summary: Transition to the unconfined domain by executing a shell.

interface.name: unconfined_domtrans_to
interface.summary: Allow unconfined to execute the specified program in the specified domain.

desc.p: Allow unconfined to execute the specified program in the specified domain.
This is a interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: unconfined_run_to
interface.summary: Allow unconfined to execute the specified program in the specified domain. Allow the specified domain the unconfined role and use of unconfined user terminals.

desc.p: Allow unconfined to execute the specified program in the specified domain. Allow the specified domain the unconfined role and use of unconfined user terminals.
This is a interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: unconfined_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit file descriptors from the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_signull
interface.summary: Send a SIGNULL signal to the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_execmem_signull
interface.summary: Send a SIGNULL signal to the unconfined execmem domain.

interface.name: unconfined_execmem_signal
interface.summary: Send a signal to the unconfined execmem domain.

interface.name: unconfined_signal
interface.summary: Send generic signals to the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_read_pipes
interface.summary: Read unconfined domain unnamed pipes.

interface.name: unconfined_dontaudit_read_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read unconfined domain unnamed pipes.

interface.name: unconfined_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write unconfined domain unnamed pipes.

interface.name: unconfined_dontaudit_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write unconfined domain unnamed pipes.

interface.name: unconfined_dontaudit_rw_stream
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write unconfined domain stream.

interface.name: unconfined_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connect to the unconfined domain using a unix domain stream socket.

interface.name: unconfined_dontaudit_rw_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write unconfined domain tcp sockets.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to read or write unconfined domain tcp sockets.
This interface was added due to a broken symptom in ldconfig.

interface.name: unconfined_dontaudit_rw_packet_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write unconfined domain packet sockets.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to read or write unconfined domain packet sockets.
This interface was added due to a broken symptom.

interface.name: unconfined_create_keys
interface.summary: Create keys for the unconfined domain.

interface.name: unconfined_dbus_send
interface.summary: Send messages to the unconfined domain over dbus.

interface.name: unconfined_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from unconfined_t over dbus.

interface.name: unconfined_dbus_connect
interface.summary: Connect to the the unconfined DBUS for service (acquire_svc).

interface.name: unconfined_ptrace
interface.summary: Allow ptrace of unconfined domain

interface.name: unconfined_rw_shm
interface.summary: Read and write to unconfined shared memory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: unconfined_execmem_rw_shm
interface.summary: Read and write to unconfined execmem shared memory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: unconfined_execmem_domtrans
interface.summary: Transition to the unconfined_execmem domain.

interface.name: unconfined_execmem_exec
interface.summary: execute the execmem applications

interface.name: unconfined_set_rlimitnh
interface.summary: Allow apps to set rlimits on userdomain

interface.name: unconfined_getpgid
interface.summary: Get the process group of unconfined.

interface.name: unconfined_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the unconfined role.

desc.p: Transition to confined nsplugin domains from unconfined user
Allow a user to login as an unconfined domain
Transition to confined qemu domains from unconfined user

interface.name: unprivuser_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the generic user role.

desc.p: Change from the generic user role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.

interface.name: webadm_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the web administrator role.

interface.name: webadm_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the web administrator role.

desc.p: Change from the web administrator role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.
Allow webadm to manage files in users home directories
Allow webadm to read files in users home directories

interface.name: xguest_role_change
interface.summary: Change to the xguest role.

interface.name: xguest_role_change_to
interface.summary: Change from the xguest role.

desc.p: Change from the xguest role to the specified role.
This is an interface to support third party modules and its use is not allowed in upstream reference policy.
Allow xguest users to mount removable media
Allow xguest to configure Network Manager and connect to apache ports
Allow xguest to use blue tooth devices
